scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run build:electron" "npm run build:renderer" && electron-builder
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev:renderer"  "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:electron: nodemon -e ts --ignore src/renderer --watch src --exec "electron -r tsx/cjs src/main/main.ts"
scripts.preview: concurrently "npm run build:electron"  "npm run build:renderer" && electron .
